is_dataframe_sorted_by(iris, by = "Sepal.Length")

pair_columns.Rd

Pairs columns and prepares them for comparison.

Usage

pair_columns(merged_data_report, suffix_x = ".x", suffix_y = ".y")

Arguments

merged_data_report

joined prepared_dfx and prepared_dfy.

suffix_x

suffix for dfx (default .x)

suffix_y

suffix for dfy (default .y)

Value

paired_columns

Examples

# mo <- create_myrror_object(iris, iris_var1)
# pair_columns(mo$merged_data_report)
